comments:
When a BIRT 2.0 ODA designer (implements the birt.report.designer ODA extension point) is plugged into latest BIRT 2.1 build, got the following error when creating a new data source design for the custom 2.0 ODA data source.

Expects backward compatibility support in BIRT 2.1.

Linda,
The following four classes have been moved back to where they were, only they are now extending the classes from ../data.ui
AbstractDataSetWizard
DefaultExtendedDataSetWizard
AbstractDataSourceConnectionWizard
DefaultExtendedDataSourceWizard
Additional files, provided by the birt.report.designer.ui.odadatasource extension point, need to be restored in BIRT 2.1, to be backward compatible.

For example, I got the following error when using a 2.0 oda designer from the community.

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/eclipse/birt/report/designer/ui/dialogs/properties/IPropertyPage
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:605)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.internal.baseadaptor.DefaultClassLoader.defineClass(DefaultClassLoader.java:160)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.baseadaptor.loader.ClasspathManager.defineClass(ClasspathManager.java:498)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.baseadaptor.loader.ClasspathManager.findClassImpl(ClasspathManager.java:468)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.baseadaptor.loader.ClasspathManager.findLocalClassImpl(ClasspathManager.java:427)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.baseadaptor.loader.ClasspathManager.findLocalClass(ClasspathManager.java:410)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.internal.baseadaptor.DefaultClassLoader.findLocalClass(DefaultClassLoader.java:188)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleLoader.findLocalClass(BundleLoader.java:339)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleLoader.findClass(BundleLoader.java:391)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleLoader.findClass(BundleLoader.java:352)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.internal.baseadaptor.DefaultClassLoader.loadClass(DefaultClassLoader.java:83)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:236)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:303)
	at com.dnnnn.drs.data.oda.ui.wizards.DRSOdatDataSourceWizard.addPages(DRSOdatDataSourceWizard.java:103)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.data.ui.datasource.DataSourceSelectionPage.getNextPageODAV2(DataSourceSelectionPage.java:453)

There are propbably other files besides IPropertyPage, as described in the 2.0 schema: org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui/schema/datasource.exsd .
e.g.
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.dialogs.properties.AbstractPropertyPage
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.views.data.wizards.AbstractDataSourceConnectionWizard
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.views.data.wizards.AbstractDataSetWizard

It appears the org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui/schema/datasource.exsd may be out of date.  The 
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.views.data.wizards.AbstractDataSourceConnectionWizard and AbstractDataSetWizard are not in BIRT 2.0 source either, but are in odadatasource/wizards instead, which have already been restored.

The issue with missing 2.0 files in the org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.dialogs.properties package still seem to apply though.
Fixed!
The restored package, org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.dialogs.properties, needs to be exported, in order for a 2.0 oda designer plugin to use the files there.

Also, the org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.dialogs.properties.AbstractPropertyPage file may need to be restored as well (should be marked as @deprecated). 
The 2.0 extension point documentation in org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui/schema/datasource.exsd states that one may extend this AbstractPropertyPage class.
Oops... missed the latest change in manifest.mf that the dialogs.properties package is already exported.

The remaining open issue, then, is whether the dialogs.properties.AbstractPropertyPage should be restored as well.

oh.... sorry missing AbstractPropertyPage class. Now put it back into designer/ui/dialogs/properties page. Fix it!
